title: Lil' Wayne, Grown Common
itunes:title: Lil' Wayne, Grown Common
description:
WED 11/2 - Lil' Wayne's latest comments about #BLACKLIVESMATTER send ripples through the twitterverse and awakens a hee-haw of massive proportions. In contrast, The Breakfast Club is joined by Common (sense, that is) to discuss his new album "Black America Again" and almost the complete opposite mindset of Lil' Tunechi.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
